details.description: Use the online tool to report extremism or extremist content on the internet - your report will be treated anonymously
details.more_information:
Examples of extremism are:

  • speeches or essays calling for racial or religious violence
  • videos of violence with messages of praise for the attackers
  • messages intended to stir up hatred against any religious or ethnic group
details.introduction: Use the online tool to report extremism or extremist content on the internet. Your report will be treated anonymously.
details.alternate_methods:
Report extremist content online by finding out which company hosts the website and telling them.

You can contact your local police if you are concerned about extremism in your area.
